page.title: 12Irvine Burns Club-Music:Art
page.content: {Irvine Burns Club}is a cultural centre in the town. Inside are two museums - the{Burns museum}and the{Burgh museum. These contain memorabillia of our town's history and its link with our national poet,{Robert Burns,}who lived in Irvine for a time. Abut 60 people visit the museum each week, admission is free. On the walls are many paintings, and in the music room above, a magnificent{Bechstein piano is used at the monthly musical evenings when many artistes come to entertain. There are singers, instrumentalists and ensembles in the varied programme and Irvine people are able to hear famous stars without having to travel from their own town.
